about_the_game:
Welcome to the RE-D Music Pack from Gee Kun Soft that introduces 11 new epic tracks for helping support intense and exciting situations in your latest RPG. Five of the tracks in this pack are created with boss battles in mind while the others can be used in story defining situations of exploring new worlds or meeting important new characters. The energy is this music pack will surely help support the grand journey you are building in RPG Maker!

Features:

* 11 BGM songs royalty-free
* wav, mp3, ogg and m4a formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
